Stixbox Function

NAME

    dbeta - The beta density function

CALLING SEQUENCE

f = dbeta(x,a,b)

PARAMETERS

    • x : real matrix
    • a,b : positive reals (x,a,b can be matrix with common dimensions).
    • f : matrix

DESCRIPTION

    The beta density function with parameters a and b at the values of x 

     f=x.^(a-1) .* (1-x).^(b-1) ./ beta(a,b)1_{0<x<1}
